select.hint_rus: Рейтинг, который гильдия дает своим участникам, делится пропорционально весу
select.sql: select *,concat(round(100*Weight/(select sum(Weight) from gd_post_types where GuildID='$auth->guild;'),2),'%') as Percent from gd_post_types where GuildID='$auth->guild;' order by Weight desc,Name
select.action: update gd_post_types set Weight=@Weight; where GuildID='$auth->guild;' and TypeID=@TypeID;

update.select: select * from gd_post_types where GuildID='$auth->guild;' and TypeID=@id;

delete.sql: set @error=if((select UserID from gd_posts where GuildID='$auth->guild;' and TypeID=@id; limit 0,1)>0,'На этой должности есть люди','') #delete from gd_post_types where GuildID='$auth->guild;' and TypeID=@id;
